column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType

#Text=Main Asami Sato Bolin Korra Mako Meelo Poki President Raiko Tenzin Varrick Antagonists Agni Kai Triad Desna and Eska says : " Minor Bumi Ikki Iroh Jinora Kya Lin Beifong Lu and Gang Naga Pabu Pema Shiro Shinobi Unalaq Zhu Li " Shiro Shinobi says : " Benders be on alert .
#Text=" Korra says : " It 's ... it 's all right , Naga .
#Text=I just had a bad dream .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " There is a madman running around our beloved city , threatening to tear it apart .
#Text=We need to create a task force whose sole mission is to find Amon and bring him to justice .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Absolutely not .
#Text=A move that aggressive would only further divide benders and nonbenders .
#Text=" Fire Nation councilwoman says : " Tarrlok , I 'm inclined to agree with your proposal , but who would even head up such a task force ?
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " It would be my honor and privilege to accept such a duty .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " This is just another one of your ploys to gain more power , is n't it ?
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " All I 'm trying to do is help .
#Text=Think back , forty - two years ago , Republic City was threatened by another dangerous man .
#Text=Yakone .
#Text=Your father was n't afraid to deal with him head - on .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " This .
#Text=.
#Text=is a completely different situation ... and how dare you compare yourself to Avatar Aang !
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " Amon is not going to stop with the bending triads .
#Text=Eventually , he will come for all us benders .
#Text=Our friends , our families .
#Text=Vote for this task force and I will stop Amon before it 's too late .
#Text=All in favor ?
#Text=" Amon says : " Good evening , my fellow Equalists .
#Text=This is your leader , Amon .

#Text=As you have heard , the Republic Council has voted to make me public enemy number one , proving once again that the bending oppressors of this city will stop at nothing to quash our revolution .
#Text=But we can not be stopped .
#Text=Our numbers grow stronger by the day .
#Text=You no longer have to live in fear .
#Text=The time has come for benders to experience fear .
#Text=" Asami says : " Oh , no !
#Text=I 'm so sorry .
#Text=I did n't see you .
#Text=" Mako says : " How could you not see me ?
#Text=I mean I was ju - juu ... uh , I was ... I - I ... wow .
#Text=I was ... " Asami says : " Are you okay ?
#Text=Did I hurt you ?
#Text=Ugh , I 'm such an idiot .
#Text=" Mako says : " Do n't worry , I 'm fine .
#Text=My brother hits me harder than that every day in practice .
#Text=" Asami says : " Wait , I recognize you .
#Text=You 're Mako , right ?
#Text=You play for the Fire Ferrets .
#Text=" Mako says : " Yeah , that 's me .
#Text=" Asami says : " I am so embarrassed .
#Text=My name is Asami .
#Text=Let me make this up to you somehow .
#Text=Uh , how about I treat you to dinner ?
#Text=Tomorrow night , eight o ' clock , Kwong 's Cuisine .
#Text=" Mako says : " Uh , Kwong 's ?
#Text=I do n't have any clothes nice enough for a place that classy .
#Text=" Asami says : " I 'll take care of that .
#Text=All you need to do is show up .
#Text=So ... it 's a date ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Uh , yeah , I guess so .
#Text=I 'll see you tomorrow night .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " We are grateful for this delicious food , for happiness , for compassion , and ... " Tarrlok says : " I 'm not interrupting , am I ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " This is my home , Tarrlok .
#Text=We 're about to eat dinner .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " Good , because I am absolutely famished .
#Text=Airbenders never turn away a hungry guest , am I right ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I suppose .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " Ah , you must be the famous Avatar Korra .
#Text=It is truly an honor .
#Text=I am Councilman Tarrlok , representative from the Northern Water Tribe .
#Text=" Korra says : " Nice to meet you .
#Text=" Ikki says : " Why do you have three ponytails ?
#Text=And how come you smell like a lady ?
#Text=You 're weird .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " Well are n't you ... precocious ?
#Text=So , I 've been reading all about your adventures in the papers .
#Text=Infiltrating Amon 's rally , now that took some real initiative .
#Text=" Korra says : " Oh , thanks .
#Text=I think you 're the first authority figure in the city who 's happy I 'm here .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " Republic City is much better off now that you 've arrived .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Enough with the flattery , Tarrlok .
#Text=What do you want from Korra ?
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " Patience , Tenzin .
#Text=I 'm getting to that .
#Text=As you may have heard , I am assembling a task force that will strike at the heart of the revolution and I want you to join me .
#Text=" Korra says : " Really ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " What ?!
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " I need someone who will help me attack Amon directly , someone who is fearless in the face of danger .
#Text=And that someone is you .
#Text=" Korra says : " Join your task force ?
#Text=I ca n't .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " I must admit , I 'm rather surprised .
#Text=I thought you 'd jump at the chance to help me lead the charge against Amon .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Me , too .
#Text=" Korra says : " I came to Republic City to finish my Avatar training with Tenzin .
#Text=Right now , I just need to focus on that .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " Which is why this opportunity is perfect .
#Text=You would get on the job experience while performing your Avatar duty for the city .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Korra gave you her answer .
#Text=It 's time for you to go .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " Very well .
#Text=But , I 'm not giving up on you just yet .
#Text=You 'll be hearing from me soon .
#Text=It has been a pleasure , Avatar Korra .
#Text=" Ikki says : " Bye - bye , ponytail man !
#Text=" Server says : " Ah , welcome to Kwong 's Cuisine , Master Mako .
#Text=" Mako says : " Uh , " Master " ?
#Text=" Mako says : " The scarf stays .
#Text=" Server says : " As you wish , sir .
#Text=This way please .
#Text=" Asami says : " I am such a big pro-bending fan .
#Text=I caught all of your matches this season .
#Text=" Mako says : " All of them ?
#Text=Wow .
#Text=Honestly , I wish there were a few you had n't seen .
#Text=" Asami says : " Oh , do n't be ridiculous , you 're amazing .
#Text=I ca n't wait to see you play in the tournament .
#Text=" Mako says : " Yeah , well , ah , maybe next year .
#Text=" Asami says : " What do you mean ?
#Text=You made it in .
#Text=" Mako says : " It just is n't in the cards for us right now .
#Text=" Asami says : " Tell me .
#Text=What 's the problem ?
#Text=" Mako says : " We do n't have the cash to ante up for the championship pot .
#Text=So , it looks like we 're out of the running .
#Text=" Asami says : " That 's not fair .
#Text=" Server says : " Pardon me , Ms. Sato .
#Text=Your main course .
#Text=" Mako says : " Ms. Sato ?
#Text=You would n't happen to be related to Hiroshi Sato , creator of the Satomobile ?
#Text=" Asami says : " Yeah .
#Text=He 's my dad .
#Text=" Mako says : " Get out of town !
#Text=" Asami says : " I 'm serious .
#Text=You want to meet him ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Meet the most successful captain of industry in all of Republic City ?
#Text=Yeah , I 'll take you up on that .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Hello , fellow teammate !
#Text=" Korra says : " Hey , Bolin .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Missed you at practice this week .
#Text=" Korra says : " Yeah , sorry about that .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Nah , that 's all right .
#Text=We 're probably out of the tournament anyways unless some money miraculously drops out of the sky by tomorrow .
#Text=Anyways , the reason I came by was to give you this .
#Text=Ta - da !
#Text=" Korra says : " Wow , thanks .
#Text=What 's this for ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Uh , oh I ca n't remember now .
#Text=Oh yeah , now I remember .
#Text=You saved me from Amon !
#Text=" Korra says : " Oh , that ?
#Text=It was no big deal .
#Text=" Bolin says : " No big deal , are you serious ?
#Text=I was totally freaking out when he was coming at me with his creepy mask all , " I will take away your bending forever . "
#Text=I mean that is .
#Text=.
#Text=scary stuff ; I still ca n't sleep well .
#Text=" Korra says : " Mhmm .
#Text=" Council page says : " Delivery for Avatar Korra .
#Text=Tarrlok sends his compliments and urges you to reconsider his offer .
#Text=" Korra says : " Tell him I have n't changed my mind .
#Text=" Council page says : " Mhmm ... " Bolin says : " Who 's this Tarrlok guy ?
#Text=Is he bothering you ?
#Text=Huh , 'cause I could have a word with him .
#Text=" Korra says : " Heh , no it 's not like that .
#Text=He 's just some old guy who works with Tenzin on the council .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Oh , good .
#Text=Good , that sounds better .
#Text=I like that better .
#Text="
